sections.abstract:
%
A $3$-web with singularities is an ordered collection of three one-dimensional distributions $L_1$, $L_2$, $L_3$ on a $2$-dimensional manifold $M$.
The subset $\Sigma \subset M$ where these distributions are not pairwise transversal is called the singularity set.
Under some conditions on $\Sigma$ we find the differential invariants of the $3$-web with singularities at the points of $\Sigma$ and give examples of calculation of these invariants.%
sections.author: Fabián Antonio Arias Amaya$^1$, José Ricardo Arteaga Bejarano$^2$ and Mikhail Malakhaltsev$^3$
